memberdef.name: JPEG_MAX_DIMENSION
memberdef.initializer: 65500L /* a tad under 64K to prevent overflows */

memberdef.name: METHODDEF
memberdef.initializer: static /* a function called through method pointers */

memberdef.name: LOCAL
memberdef.initializer: static /* a function used only in its module */

memberdef.name: EXTERN
memberdef.initializer: extern /* a reference to a GLOBAL function */
